benchmark_details.name: CliniDial
benchmark_details.overview: CliniDial is a naturally emerging multimodal dialogue dataset for team reflection during clinical operations, capturing audio data, simulated physiology signals, and team operations from two camera angles, annotated to understand teamwork.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a dataset that models communications and teamwork during medical operations to facilitate future NLP research.

data.source: Simulated operation sessions with medical professionals.
data.annotation: Manual annotation using a team reflection behavior framework.

methodology.calculation: Average macro and micro F1 scores across different setups.
methodology.interpretation: Higher macro F1 score indicates better overall performance across all classes.
methodology.baseline_results: Best-performing model achieves a macro F1 score of 51.09.
methodology.validation: Ten-fold cross-validation was used for the dataset.

ethical_and_legal_considerations.privacy_and_anonymity: Privacy measures have been taken; data will not be released without anonymization.
ethical_and_legal_considerations.consent_procedures: Study approved by the Institutional Review Board.
